casebody.data:
O & M INDUSTRIES
v.
SMITH ENGINEERING. No. 502PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2005. Matthew H. Bryant, T. Paul Hendrick, Winston-Salem, for O & M Industries. Rolly L. Chambers, Charlotte, for Kurz Transfer Products. James R. Vann, Raleigh, Nan E. Hannah, Cary, for Southeastern Asso. of Credit Mgt. L. Holmes Eleazer, Jr., Charlotte, Fenton T. Erwin, Jr., for American Subcontractors Asso.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of June 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Kurz Transfer Products) shall have up to and including the 21st day of July 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2005."
